medical_history.chief_complaint: Extensive dermatitis in back and buttocks.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 2 months prior to consultation in May 2007 and did not improve with topical corticosteroids. Symptoms were associated with two new armchairs imported from China, purchased 15 days before the onset.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Previous reaction to quinoa in 2006; seasonal rhinitis to grass pollens.
medical_history.family_history: Wife has a history of intolerance to metals; similar dermatitis and respiratory symptoms.
